Articles.Content: Quill18 had played some Kerbal Space Program [ ">**back in 2011**](

And he even reminds us of the weird gear hotkey behaviour. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

It is really refreshing, watching someone you knows basically next to nothing about the game - but at the same time very frustrating and screen-screaming-inducing! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-20T23:00:57Z" title="05/20/2015 11:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 20, 2015</time> by KerbMav**
It;s funny how he still tries to do the 45 degree turn, nobody told him about aerodynamics yet ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

great video. I was thinking the other day how much fun i had when i knew nothing. I mean i still love the game, but it was just different and more *exciting* when i was exploring what the game had to offer
